title: Carnival of Monsters
description: Roll up, roll up, if you dare, to Doctor Vindicta’s Carnival! Gasp at the dancing ghosts! Grimace at the creepy clowns! It’s all harmless fun and frights…until a young boy disappears and his sister swears he was snatched by a monster. Only the bravest detectives can detain a send for supernatural investigators Billy Flint and Charley Steel!
author: Andrew Beasley
